title: So funny, i wonder what Riot has to say about all this
body:

replies.body:
You'll only be able to see your own if custom skins are anything to go by.

Seriously though, you're probably the type of person who'll go to a free sausage-sizzle and demand a free coke. So many entitled brats playing this game and that's what's actually the problem right now.

Oh look the Riot fanboy that will defend Riots shitty practices no matter what, get the fuck outa here with that shit, how one can defend Riot for this is fucking ridiculous, keep getting ripped off and lied to you dumb blind fanboy.

Oh look at how I'm getting ripped off by these COMPLETELY OPTIONAL PURCHASE skin recolors.

Jesus, you people whine way too much.

> [{quoted}](name=Knuxx,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rzzyaTZJ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-10T00:13:40.690+0000)
>
> Oh look at how I'm getting ripped off by these COMPLETELY OPTIONAL PURCHASE skin recolors.
> 
> Jesus, you people whine way too much.

it's just riot being a bunch of cheapos.

I totally understand everyone's view on this, but the length people are going on this is ridiculous.

It's not even out yet and it's optional.

Like, if it was a change in a patch, then yes, we need to express opinions because that gets implemented and affects everyone on a mechanical level.

But this is a skin, or more accurately, a re-colour of a skin.
I don't get these skins are they visible to all players? If so won't that cause readability issues?

> readability issues?

How would there be readability issues if they aren't visible?

It changes skins just for yourself, it doesn't actually change the size of skills, models etc.

Honestly i saw the chroma's thing and then saw the price and face palmed at the fact that some dickheads will actually buy this shit when essentially you can do the same thing yourself, sure you'll be the only one seeing it, but it's not worth paying for it anyway.

This literally takes like 30 minutes to do as well and its not hard, all you're doing is changing the color of something its no different from going to paint and changing the color, then they have the nerve to say its high standards which is the reason for the price, pathetic this is nothing but a cash grab from Riot, charging stupid prices for shit that a monkey can do in less than an hour.

Riot: Here guys have blue, yellow and red Zac, it only costs 590 RP but you can also get a special purple Zac that costs 975, we'll be introducing an ultimate skin too called rainbow Zac that has all these colors, IT'LL BE WICKED SICK.

Cant wait for what they have to say when they come around to the Zac chroma's, wonder what excuse they'll have for 975 RP purple Zac, they'll prob just say high standards LOL.
I am confoos, I was kill for like 2 months can u tl;dr me OP

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rzzyaTZJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-08T22:38:41.047+0000)
>
> I am confoos, I was kill for like 2 months can u tl;dr me OP

riot are selling 3 recolours for 590 rp, when they take about 30 mins to make yourself. instead of selling them for large amounts of IP or making them rewards from champion mastery

The easiest fix for this situation is to just let the Chroma skins be purchasable with IP.

But, in Riot's defence, these are OPTIONAL. You don't need to buy them.

I totally understand where people are coming from, but it doesn't change the fact these are OPTIONAL

Don't like them? Don't buy them.

Better yet, just do what everyone else seems to be doing, make your own!

I think it's a little early to judge, because they only made 2 champion "chromas" as a test.

If they continued to sell them it should be seen as greedy, but it's entirely possible that they will introduce chromas with champion mastery.
